location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: There is a list of contents at the front of each Report.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at 1 on the front cover and terminates at 306 on the back cover. These numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and can be found in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio. The following folios need to be folded out to be read: ff. 40, 261.
